original: Enger, Nils Ragnar Filip, direktör, Åmål, f. 17/1/02 i Åmål av fabr. Per E. o. Hulda Igel. G. 32 m. Majken Strandberg. Barn: Göran f. 35, Lennart 37, Jan 42, Leif 43. — Stud:ex. 22 i Gbg, fil. mag. 27 i Upps. Observ. v. Abisko naturvetenskapl. stat. 28-29, lärov:lär. 35-38, kamr. i A-B P. Enger 39-41, dir. sed. 41. Styr :led. där samt i Engers Bostads A-B, A-B Västgöta Täckfabr., Engers Manufakturaffär A-B o. Säffle Textil A-B. Led. av iskolstyr. sed. 47, sekr. i Åmåls mis-•sionsförs. sed. 46.
translated: Enger, Nils Ragnar Filip, director, Åmål, b. January 17, 1902 in Åmål to factory owner Per E. and Hulda Igel. Married in 1932 to Majken Strandberg. Children: Göran b. 1935, Lennart b. 1937, Jan b. 1942, Leif b. 1943. He graduated from high school in Gothenburg in 1922 and earned a Bachelor of Arts degree from Uppsala University in 1927. He worked as an observer at the Abisko Scientific Research Station in 1928-29, a teacher in 1935-38, and a clerk at A-B P. Enger from 1939-41 before becoming a director in 1941. He served as a board member in A-B P. Enger, Engers Bostads A-B, A-B Västgöta Täckfabr., Engers Manufakturaffär A-B, and Säffle Textil A-B. He was a member of the school board since 1947 and secretary of Åmåls missionsförs. since 1946.
